00071 #define SEQ_LEFTHANDLE      1
00072 #define SEQ_RIGHTHANDLE 2

00075 /* Note, Don't use SEQ_BEGIN/SEQ_END while drawing!
00076  * it messes up transform, - Campbell */
00077 static void draw_shadedstrip(Sequence *seq, unsigned char col[3], float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2);
00078 
00079 static void get_seq_color3ubv(Scene *curscene, Sequence *seq, unsigned char col[3])
00080 {
00081     unsigned char blendcol[3];
00082     SolidColorVars *colvars = (SolidColorVars *)seq->effectdata;
00083 
00084     switch (seq->type) {
00085         case SEQ_IMAGE:
00086             UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_SEQ_IMAGE, col);
00087             break;
00088 
00089         case SEQ_META:
00090             UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_SEQ_META, col);
00091             break;
00092 
00093         case SEQ_MOVIE:
00094             UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_SEQ_MOVIE, col);
00095             break;
00096 
00097         case SEQ_MOVIECLIP:
00098             UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_SEQ_MOVIECLIP, col);
00099             break;
00100         
00101         case SEQ_SCENE:
00102             UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_SEQ_SCENE, col);
00103         
00104             if (seq->scene == curscene) {
00105                 UI_GetColorPtrShade3ubv(col, col, 20);
00106             }
00107             break;
00108         
00109         /* transitions */
00110         case SEQ_CROSS:
00111         case SEQ_GAMCROSS:
00112         case SEQ_WIPE:
00113             UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_SEQ_TRANSITION, col);
00114 
00115             /* slightly offset hue to distinguish different effects */
00116             if (seq->type == SEQ_CROSS)    rgb_byte_set_hue_float_offset(col, 0.04);
00117             if (seq->type == SEQ_GAMCROSS) rgb_byte_set_hue_float_offset(col, 0.08);
00118             if (seq->type == SEQ_WIPE)     rgb_byte_set_hue_float_offset(col, 0.12);
00119             break;
00120 
00121         /* effects */
00122         case SEQ_TRANSFORM:
00123         case SEQ_SPEED:
00124         case SEQ_ADD:
00125         case SEQ_SUB:
00126         case SEQ_MUL:
00127         case SEQ_ALPHAOVER:
00128         case SEQ_ALPHAUNDER:
00129         case SEQ_OVERDROP:
00130         case SEQ_GLOW:
00131         case SEQ_MULTICAM:
00132         case SEQ_ADJUSTMENT:
00133             UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_SEQ_EFFECT, col);
00134 
00135             /* slightly offset hue to distinguish different effects */
00136             if      (seq->type == SEQ_ADD)        rgb_byte_set_hue_float_offset(col, 0.04);
00137             else if (seq->type == SEQ_SUB)        rgb_byte_set_hue_float_offset(col, 0.08);
00138             else if (seq->type == SEQ_MUL)        rgb_byte_set_hue_float_offset(col, 0.12);
00139             else if (seq->type == SEQ_ALPHAOVER)  rgb_byte_set_hue_float_offset(col, 0.16);
00140             else if (seq->type == SEQ_ALPHAUNDER) rgb_byte_set_hue_float_offset(col, 0.20);
00141             else if (seq->type == SEQ_OVERDROP)   rgb_byte_set_hue_float_offset(col, 0.24);
00142             else if (seq->type == SEQ_GLOW)       rgb_byte_set_hue_float_offset(col, 0.28);
00143             else if (seq->type == SEQ_TRANSFORM)  rgb_byte_set_hue_float_offset(col, 0.36);
00144             else if (seq->type == SEQ_MULTICAM)   rgb_byte_set_hue_float_offset(col, 0.32);
00145             else if (seq->type == SEQ_ADJUSTMENT) rgb_byte_set_hue_float_offset(col, 0.40);
00146             break;
00147 
00148         case SEQ_COLOR:
00149             if (colvars->col) {
00150                 rgb_float_to_uchar(col, colvars->col);
00151             }
00152             else {
00153                 col[0] = col[1] = col[2] = 128;
00154             }
00155             break;
00156         
00157         case SEQ_PLUGIN:
00158             UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_SEQ_PLUGIN, col);
00159             break;
00160 
00161         case SEQ_SOUND:
00162             UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_SEQ_AUDIO, col);
00163             blendcol[0] = blendcol[1] = blendcol[2] = 128;
00164             if (seq->flag & SEQ_MUTE) UI_GetColorPtrBlendShade3ubv(col, blendcol, col, 0.5, 20);
00165             break;
00166         
00167         default:
00168             col[0] = 10; col[1] = 255; col[2] = 40;
00169     }
00170 }
00171 
00172 static void drawseqwave(Scene *scene, Sequence *seq, float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2, float stepsize)
00173 {
00174     /*
00175      * x1 is the starting x value to draw the wave,
00176      * x2 the end x value, same for y1 and y2
00177      * stepsize is width of a pixel.
00178      */
00179     if (seq->flag & SEQ_AUDIO_DRAW_WAVEFORM) {
00180         int i, j, pos;
00181         int length = floor((x2 - x1) / stepsize) + 1;
00182         float ymid = (y1 + y2) / 2;
00183         float yscale = (y2 - y1) / 2;
00184         float samplestep;
00185         float startsample, endsample;
00186         float value;
00187 
00188         SoundWaveform *waveform;
00189 
00190         if (!seq->sound->waveform)
00191             sound_read_waveform(seq->sound);
00192 
00193         if (!seq->sound->waveform)
00194             return;  /* zero length sound */
00195 
00196         waveform = seq->sound->waveform;
00197 
00198         if (!waveform)
00199             return;
00200 
00201         startsample = floor((seq->startofs + seq->anim_startofs) / FPS * SOUND_WAVE_SAMPLES_PER_SECOND);
00202         endsample = ceil((seq->startofs + seq->anim_startofs + seq->enddisp - seq->startdisp) / FPS * SOUND_WAVE_SAMPLES_PER_SECOND);
00203         samplestep = (endsample - startsample) * stepsize / (x2 - x1);
00204 
00205         if (length > floor((waveform->length - startsample) / samplestep))
00206             length = floor((waveform->length - startsample) / samplestep);
00207 
00208         glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00209         for (i = 0; i < length; i++)
00210         {
00211             pos = startsample + i * samplestep;
00212 
00213             value = waveform->data[pos * 3];
00214 
00215             for (j = pos + 1; (j < waveform->length) && (j < pos + samplestep); j++)
00216             {
00217                 if (value > waveform->data[j * 3])
00218                     value = waveform->data[j * 3];
00219             }
00220 
00221             glVertex2f(x1 + i * stepsize, ymid + value * yscale);
00222         }
00223         glEnd();
00224 
00225         glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00226         for (i = 0; i < length; i++)
00227         {
00228             pos = startsample + i * samplestep;
00229 
00230             value = waveform->data[pos * 3 + 1];
00231 
00232             for (j = pos + 1; (j < waveform->length) && (j < pos + samplestep); j++)
00233             {
00234                 if (value < waveform->data[j * 3 + 1])
00235                     value = waveform->data[j * 3 + 1];
00236             }
00237 
00238             glVertex2f(x1 + i * stepsize, ymid + value * yscale);
00239         }
00240         glEnd();
00241     }
00242 }
00243 
00244 static void drawmeta_stipple(int value)
00245 {
00246     if (value) {
00247         glEnable(GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE);
00248         glPolygonStipple(stipple_halftone);
00249         
00250         glEnable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00251         glLineStipple(1, 0x8888);
00252     }
00253     else {
00254         glDisable(GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE);
00255         glDisable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00256     }
00257 }
00258 
00259 static void drawmeta_contents(Scene *scene, Sequence *seqm, float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2)
00260 {
00261     /* note: this used to use SEQ_BEGIN/SEQ_END, but it messes up the
00262      * seq->depth value, (needed by transform when doing overlap checks)
00263      * so for now, just use the meta's immediate children, could be fixed but
00264      * its only drawing - campbell */
00265     Sequence *seq;
00266     unsigned char col[4];
00267 
00268     int chan_min = MAXSEQ;
00269     int chan_max = 0;
00270     int chan_range = 0;
00271     float draw_range = y2 - y1;
00272     float draw_height;
00273 
00274     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00275     glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00276 
00277     if (seqm->flag & SEQ_MUTE)
00278         drawmeta_stipple(1);
00279 
00280     for (seq = seqm->seqbase.first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
00281         chan_min = MIN2(chan_min, seq->machine);
00282         chan_max = MAX2(chan_max, seq->machine);
00283     }
00284 
00285     chan_range = (chan_max - chan_min) + 1;
00286     draw_height = draw_range / chan_range;
00287 
00288     col[3] = 196; /* alpha, used for all meta children */
00289 
00290     for (seq = seqm->seqbase.first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
00291         if ((seq->startdisp > x2 || seq->enddisp < x1) == 0) {
00292             float y_chan = (seq->machine - chan_min) / (float)(chan_range) * draw_range;
00293             float x1_chan = seq->startdisp;
00294             float x2_chan = seq->enddisp;
00295             float y1_chan, y2_chan;
00296 
00297             if ((seqm->flag & SEQ_MUTE) == 0 && (seq->flag & SEQ_MUTE))
00298                 drawmeta_stipple(1);
00299 
00300             get_seq_color3ubv(scene, seq, col);
00301 
00302             glColor4ubv(col);
00303             
00304             /* clamp within parent sequence strip bounds */
00305             if (x1_chan < x1) x1_chan = x1;
00306             if (x2_chan > x2) x2_chan = x2;
00307 
00308             y1_chan = y1 + y_chan + (draw_height * SEQ_STRIP_OFSBOTTOM);
00309             y2_chan = y1 + y_chan + (draw_height * SEQ_STRIP_OFSTOP);
00310 
00311             glRectf(x1_chan,  y1_chan, x2_chan,  y2_chan);
00312 
00313             UI_GetColorPtrShade3ubv(col, col, -30);
00314             glColor4ubv(col);
00315             fdrawbox(x1_chan,  y1_chan, x2_chan,  y2_chan);
00316 
00317             if ((seqm->flag & SEQ_MUTE) == 0 && (seq->flag & SEQ_MUTE))
00318                 drawmeta_stipple(0);
00319         }
00320     }
00321 
00322     if (seqm->flag & SEQ_MUTE)
00323         drawmeta_stipple(0);
00324     
00325     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00326 }
00327 
00328 /* draw a handle, for each end of a sequence strip */
00329 static void draw_seq_handle(View2D *v2d, Sequence *seq, float pixelx, short direction)
00330 {
00331     float v1[2], v2[2], v3[2], rx1 = 0, rx2 = 0; //for triangles and rect
00332     float x1, x2, y1, y2;
00333     float handsize;
00334     float minhandle, maxhandle;
00335     char numstr[32];
00336     unsigned int whichsel = 0;
00337     
00338     x1 = seq->startdisp;
00339     x2 = seq->enddisp;
00340     
00341     y1 = seq->machine + SEQ_STRIP_OFSBOTTOM;
00342     y2 = seq->machine + SEQ_STRIP_OFSTOP;
00343     
00344     /* clamp handles to defined size in pixel space */
00345     handsize = seq->handsize;
00346     minhandle = 7;
00347     maxhandle = 40;
00348     CLAMP(handsize, minhandle * pixelx, maxhandle * pixelx);
00349     
00350     /* set up co-ordinates/dimensions for either left or right handle */
00351     if (direction == SEQ_LEFTHANDLE) {  
00352         rx1 = x1;
00353         rx2 = x1 + handsize * 0.75f;
00354         
00355         v1[0] = x1 + handsize / 4; v1[1] = y1 + ( ((y1 + y2) / 2.0f - y1) / 2);
00356         v2[0] = x1 + handsize / 4; v2[1] = y2 - ( ((y1 + y2) / 2.0f - y1) / 2);
00357         v3[0] = v2[0] + handsize / 4; v3[1] = (y1 + y2) / 2.0f;
00358         
00359         whichsel = SEQ_LEFTSEL;
00360     }
00361     else if (direction == SEQ_RIGHTHANDLE) {
00362         rx1 = x2 - handsize * 0.75f;
00363         rx2 = x2;
00364         
00365         v1[0] = x2 - handsize / 4; v1[1] = y1 + ( ((y1 + y2) / 2.0f - y1) / 2);
00366         v2[0] = x2 - handsize / 4; v2[1] = y2 - ( ((y1 + y2) / 2.0f - y1) / 2);
00367         v3[0] = v2[0] - handsize / 4; v3[1] = (y1 + y2) / 2.0f;
00368         
00369         whichsel = SEQ_RIGHTSEL;
00370     }
00371     
00372     /* draw! */
00373     if (seq->type < SEQ_EFFECT || 
00374         get_sequence_effect_num_inputs(seq->type) == 0) {
00375         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00376         
00377         glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00378         
00379         if (seq->flag & whichsel) glColor4ub(0, 0, 0, 80);
00380         else if (seq->flag & SELECT) glColor4ub(255, 255, 255, 30);
00381         else glColor4ub(0, 0, 0, 22);
00382         
00383         glRectf(rx1, y1, rx2, y2);
00384         
00385         if (seq->flag & whichsel) glColor4ub(255, 255, 255, 200);
00386         else glColor4ub(0, 0, 0, 50);
00387         
00388         glEnable(GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH);
00389         glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00390         glVertex2fv(v1); glVertex2fv(v2); glVertex2fv(v3);
00391         glEnd();
00392         
00393         glDisable(GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH);
00394         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00395     }
00396     
00397     if (G.moving || (seq->flag & whichsel)) {
00398         const char col[4] = {255, 255, 255, 255};
00399         if (direction == SEQ_LEFTHANDLE) {
00400             BLI_snprintf(numstr, sizeof(numstr), "%d", seq->startdisp);
00401             x1 = rx1;
00402             y1 -= 0.45f;
00403         }
00404         else {
00405             BLI_snprintf(numstr, sizeof(numstr), "%d", seq->enddisp - 1);
00406             x1 = x2 - handsize * 0.75f;
00407             y1 = y2 + 0.05f;
00408         }
00409         UI_view2d_text_cache_add(v2d, x1, y1, numstr, col);
00410     }   
00411 }
00412 
00413 static void draw_seq_extensions(Scene *scene, ARegion *ar, Sequence *seq)
00414 {
00415     float x1, x2, y1, y2, pixely, a;
00416     unsigned char col[3], blendcol[3];
00417     View2D *v2d = &ar->v2d;
00418     
00419     if (seq->type >= SEQ_EFFECT) return;
00420 
00421     x1 = seq->startdisp;
00422     x2 = seq->enddisp;
00423     
00424     y1 = seq->machine + SEQ_STRIP_OFSBOTTOM;
00425     y2 = seq->machine + SEQ_STRIP_OFSTOP;
00426 
00427     pixely = (v2d->cur.ymax - v2d->cur.ymin) / (v2d->mask.ymax - v2d->mask.ymin);
00428     
00429     if (pixely <= 0) return;  /* can happen when the view is split/resized */
00430     
00431     blendcol[0] = blendcol[1] = blendcol[2] = 120;
00432 
00433     if (seq->startofs) {
00434         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00435         glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00436         
00437         get_seq_color3ubv(scene, seq, col);
00438         
00439         if (seq->flag & SELECT) {
00440             UI_GetColorPtrBlendShade3ubv(col, blendcol, col, 0.3, -40);
00441             glColor4ub(col[0], col[1], col[2], 170);
00442         }
00443         else {
00444             UI_GetColorPtrBlendShade3ubv(col, blendcol, col, 0.6, 0);
00445             glColor4ub(col[0], col[1], col[2], 110);
00446         }
00447         
00448         glRectf((float)(seq->start), y1 - SEQ_STRIP_OFSBOTTOM, x1, y1);
00449         
00450         if (seq->flag & SELECT) glColor4ub(col[0], col[1], col[2], 255);
00451         else glColor4ub(col[0], col[1], col[2], 160);
00452 
00453         fdrawbox((float)(seq->start), y1 - SEQ_STRIP_OFSBOTTOM, x1, y1);  //outline
00454         
00455         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00456     }
00457     if (seq->endofs) {
00458         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00459         glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00460         
00461         get_seq_color3ubv(scene, seq, col);
00462         
00463         if (seq->flag & SELECT) {
00464             UI_GetColorPtrBlendShade3ubv(col, blendcol, col, 0.3, -40);
00465             glColor4ub(col[0], col[1], col[2], 170);
00466         }
00467         else {
00468             UI_GetColorPtrBlendShade3ubv(col, blendcol, col, 0.6, 0);
00469             glColor4ub(col[0], col[1], col[2], 110);
00470         }
00471         
00472         glRectf(x2, y2, (float)(seq->start + seq->len), y2 + SEQ_STRIP_OFSBOTTOM);
00473         
00474         if (seq->flag & SELECT) glColor4ub(col[0], col[1], col[2], 255);
00475         else glColor4ub(col[0], col[1], col[2], 160);
00476 
00477         fdrawbox(x2, y2, (float)(seq->start + seq->len), y2 + SEQ_STRIP_OFSBOTTOM); //outline
00478         
00479         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00480     }
00481     if (seq->startstill) {
00482         get_seq_color3ubv(scene, seq, col);
00483         UI_GetColorPtrBlendShade3ubv(col, blendcol, col, 0.75, 40);
00484         glColor3ubv((GLubyte *)col);
00485         
00486         draw_shadedstrip(seq, col, x1, y1, (float)(seq->start), y2);
00487         
00488         /* feint pinstripes, helps see exactly which is extended and which isn't,
00489          * especially when the extension is very small */ 
00490         if (seq->flag & SELECT) UI_GetColorPtrBlendShade3ubv(col, col, col, 0.0, 24);
00491         else UI_GetColorPtrShade3ubv(col, col, -16);
00492         
00493         glColor3ubv((GLubyte *)col);
00494         
00495         for (a = y1; a < y2; a += pixely * 2.0f) {
00496             fdrawline(x1,  a,  (float)(seq->start),  a);
00497         }
00498     }
00499     if (seq->endstill) {
00500         get_seq_color3ubv(scene, seq, col);
00501         UI_GetColorPtrBlendShade3ubv(col, blendcol, col, 0.75, 40);
00502         glColor3ubv((GLubyte *)col);
00503         
00504         draw_shadedstrip(seq, col, (float)(seq->start + seq->len), y1, x2, y2);
00505         
00506         /* feint pinstripes, helps see exactly which is extended and which isn't,
00507          * especially when the extension is very small */ 
00508         if (seq->flag & SELECT) UI_GetColorPtrShade3ubv(col, col, 24);
00509         else UI_GetColorPtrShade3ubv(col, col, -16);
00510         
00511         glColor3ubv((GLubyte *)col);
00512         
00513         for (a = y1; a < y2; a += pixely * 2.0f) {
00514             fdrawline((float)(seq->start + seq->len),  a,  x2,  a);
00515         }
00516     }
00517 }
00518 
00519 /* draw info text on a sequence strip */
00520 static void draw_seq_text(View2D *v2d, Sequence *seq, float x1, float x2, float y1, float y2, const unsigned char background_col[3])
00521 {
00522     rctf rect;
00523     char str[32 + FILE_MAX];
00524     const char *name = seq->name + 2;
00525     char col[4];
00526 
00527     /* note, all strings should include 'name' */
00528     if (name[0] == '\0')
00529         name = give_seqname(seq);
00530 
00531     if (seq->type == SEQ_META || seq->type == SEQ_ADJUSTMENT) {
00532         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%d | %s", seq->len, name);
00533     }
00534     else if (seq->type == SEQ_SCENE) {
00535         if (seq->scene) {
00536             if (seq->scene_camera) {
00537                 BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%d | %s: %s (%s)",
00538                              seq->len, name, seq->scene->id.name + 2, ((ID *)seq->scene_camera)->name + 2);
00539             }
00540             else {
00541                 BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%d | %s: %s",
00542                              seq->len, name, seq->scene->id.name + 2);
00543             }
00544         }
00545         else {
00546             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%d | %s",
00547                          seq->len, name);
00548         }
00549     }
00550     else if (seq->type == SEQ_MOVIECLIP) {
00551         if (seq->clip && strcmp(name, seq->clip->id.name + 2) != 0) {
00552             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%d | %s: %s",
00553                          seq->len, name, seq->clip->id.name + 2);
00554         }
00555         else {
00556             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%d | %s",
00557                          seq->len, name);
00558         }
00559     }
00560     else if (seq->type == SEQ_MULTICAM) {
00561         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "Cam | %s: %d",
00562                      name, seq->multicam_source);
00563     }
00564     else if (seq->type == SEQ_IMAGE) {
00565         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%d | %s: %s%s",
00566                      seq->len, name, seq->strip->dir, seq->strip->stripdata->name);
00567     }
00568     else if (seq->type & SEQ_EFFECT) {
00569         int can_float = (seq->type != SEQ_PLUGIN) || (seq->plugin && seq->plugin->version >= 4);
00570 
00571         if (seq->seq3 != seq->seq2 && seq->seq1 != seq->seq3) {
00572             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%d | %s: %d>%d (use %d)%s",
00573                          seq->len, name, seq->seq1->machine, seq->seq2->machine, seq->seq3->machine,
00574                          can_float ? "" : " No float, upgrade plugin!");
00575         }
00576         else if (seq->seq1 && seq->seq2) {
00577             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%d | %s: %d>%d%s",
00578                          seq->len, name, seq->seq1->machine, seq->seq2->machine,
00579                          can_float ? "" : " No float, upgrade plugin!");
00580         }
00581         else {
00582             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%d | %s",
00583                          seq->len, name);
00584         }
00585     }
00586     else if (seq->type == SEQ_SOUND) {
00587         if (seq->sound)
00588             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%d | %s: %s",
00589                          seq->len, name, seq->sound->name);
00590         else
00591             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%d | %s",
00592                          seq->len, name);
00593     }
00594     else if (seq->type == SEQ_MOVIE) {
00595         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "%d | %s: %s%s",
00596                      seq->len, name, seq->strip->dir, seq->strip->stripdata->name);
00597     }
00598     
00599     if (seq->flag & SELECT) {
00600         col[0] = col[1] = col[2] = 255;
00601     }
00602     else if ((((int)background_col[0] + (int)background_col[1] + (int)background_col[2]) / 3) < 50) {
00603         col[0] = col[1] = col[2] = 80; /* use lighter text color for dark background */
00604     }
00605     else {
00606         col[0] = col[1] = col[2] = 0;
00607     }
00608     col[3] = 255;
00609 
00610     rect.xmin = x1;
00611     rect.ymin = y1;
00612     rect.xmax = x2;
00613     rect.ymax = y2;
00614     UI_view2d_text_cache_rectf(v2d, &rect, str, col);
00615 }
00616 
00617 /* draws a shaded strip, made from gradient + flat color + gradient */
00618 static void draw_shadedstrip(Sequence *seq, unsigned char col[3], float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2)
00619 {
00620     float ymid1, ymid2;
00621     
00622     if (seq->flag & SEQ_MUTE) {
00623         glEnable(GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE);
00624         glPolygonStipple(stipple_halftone);
00625     }
00626     
00627     ymid1 = (y2 - y1) * 0.25f + y1;
00628     ymid2 = (y2 - y1) * 0.65f + y1;
00629     
00630     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00631     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00632     
00633     if (seq->flag & SEQ_INVALID_EFFECT) { col[0] = 255; col[1] = 0; col[2] = 255; }
00634     else if (seq->flag & SELECT) UI_GetColorPtrShade3ubv(col, col, -50);
00635     /* else UI_GetColorPtrShade3ubv(col, col, 0); */ /* DO NOTHING */
00636     
00637     glColor3ubv(col);
00638     
00639     glVertex2f(x1, y1);
00640     glVertex2f(x2, y1);
00641 
00642     if (seq->flag & SEQ_INVALID_EFFECT) { col[0] = 255; col[1] = 0; col[2] = 255; }
00643     else if (seq->flag & SELECT) UI_GetColorPtrBlendShade3ubv(col, col, col, 0.0, 5);
00644     else UI_GetColorPtrShade3ubv(col, col, -5);
00645 
00646     glColor3ubv((GLubyte *)col);
00647     
00648     glVertex2f(x2, ymid1);
00649     glVertex2f(x1, ymid1);
00650     
00651     glEnd();
00652     
00653     glRectf(x1,  ymid1,  x2,  ymid2);
00654     
00655     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00656     
00657     glVertex2f(x1, ymid2);
00658     glVertex2f(x2, ymid2);
00659     
00660     if (seq->flag & SELECT) UI_GetColorPtrShade3ubv(col, col, -15);
00661     else UI_GetColorPtrShade3ubv(col, col, 25);
00662     
00663     glColor3ubv((GLubyte *)col);
00664     
00665     glVertex2f(x2, y2);
00666     glVertex2f(x1, y2);
00667     
00668     glEnd();
00669     
00670     if (seq->flag & SEQ_MUTE) {
00671         glDisable(GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE);
00672     }
00673 }
00674 
00675 /*
00676  * Draw a sequence strip, bounds check already made
00677  * ARegion is currently only used to get the windows width in pixels
00678  * so wave file sample drawing precision is zoom adjusted
00679  */
00680 static void draw_seq_strip(Scene *scene, ARegion *ar, Sequence *seq, int outline_tint, float pixelx)
00681 {
00682     View2D *v2d = &ar->v2d;
00683     float x1, x2, y1, y2;
00684     unsigned char col[3], background_col[3], is_single_image;
00685 
00686     /* we need to know if this is a single image/color or not for drawing */
00687     is_single_image = (char)seq_single_check(seq);
00688     
00689     /* body */
00690     x1 = (seq->startstill) ? seq->start : seq->startdisp;
00691     y1 = seq->machine + SEQ_STRIP_OFSBOTTOM;
00692     x2 = (seq->endstill) ? (seq->start + seq->len) : seq->enddisp;
00693     y2 = seq->machine + SEQ_STRIP_OFSTOP;
00694 
00695 
00696     /* get the correct color per strip type*/
00697     //get_seq_color3ubv(scene, seq, col);
00698     get_seq_color3ubv(scene, seq, background_col);
00699     
00700     /* draw the main strip body */
00701     if (is_single_image) {  /* single image */
00702         draw_shadedstrip(seq, background_col, seq_tx_get_final_left(seq, 0), y1, seq_tx_get_final_right(seq, 0), y2);
00703     }
00704     else {  /* normal operation */
00705         draw_shadedstrip(seq, background_col, x1, y1, x2, y2);
00706     }
00707     
00708     /* draw additional info and controls */
00709     if (!is_single_image)
00710         draw_seq_extensions(scene, ar, seq);
00711     
00712     draw_seq_handle(v2d, seq, pixelx, SEQ_LEFTHANDLE);
00713     draw_seq_handle(v2d, seq, pixelx, SEQ_RIGHTHANDLE);
00714     
00715     /* draw the strip outline */
00716     x1 = seq->startdisp;
00717     x2 = seq->enddisp;
00718     
00719     /* draw sound wave */
00720     if (seq->type == SEQ_SOUND) {
00721         drawseqwave(scene, seq, x1, y1, x2, y2, (ar->v2d.cur.xmax - ar->v2d.cur.xmin) / ar->winx);
00722     }
00723 
00724     /* draw lock */
00725     if (seq->flag & SEQ_LOCK) {
00726         glEnable(GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE);
00727         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00728 
00729         /* light stripes */
00730         glColor4ub(255, 255, 255, 32);
00731         glPolygonStipple(stipple_diag_stripes_pos);
00732         glRectf(x1, y1, x2, y2);
00733 
00734         /* dark stripes */
00735         glColor4ub(0, 0, 0, 32);
00736         glPolygonStipple(stipple_diag_stripes_neg);
00737         glRectf(x1, y1, x2, y2);
00738 
00739         glDisable(GL_POLYGON_STIPPLE);
00740         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00741     }
00742 
00743     get_seq_color3ubv(scene, seq, col);
00744     if (G.moving && (seq->flag & SELECT)) {
00745         if (seq->flag & SEQ_OVERLAP) {
00746             col[0] = 255; col[1] = col[2] = 40;
00747         }
00748         else
00749             UI_GetColorPtrShade3ubv(col, col, 120 + outline_tint);
00750     }
00751     else
00752         UI_GetColorPtrShade3ubv(col, col, outline_tint);
00753     
00754     glColor3ubv((GLubyte *)col);
00755     
00756     if (seq->flag & SEQ_MUTE) {
00757         glEnable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00758         glLineStipple(1, 0x8888);
00759     }
00760     
00761     uiDrawBoxShade(GL_LINE_LOOP, x1, y1, x2, y2, 0.0, 0.1, 0.0);
00762     
00763     if (seq->flag & SEQ_MUTE) {
00764         glDisable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
00765     }
00766     
00767     if (seq->type == SEQ_META) {
00768         drawmeta_contents(scene, seq, x1, y1, x2, y2);
00769     }
00770     
00771     /* calculate if seq is long enough to print a name */
00772     x1 = seq->startdisp + seq->handsize;
00773     x2 = seq->enddisp - seq->handsize;
00774 
00775     /* info text on the strip */
00776     if (x1 < v2d->cur.xmin) x1 = v2d->cur.xmin;
00777     else if (x1 > v2d->cur.xmax) x1 = v2d->cur.xmax;
00778     if (x2 < v2d->cur.xmin) x2 = v2d->cur.xmin;
00779     else if (x2 > v2d->cur.xmax) x2 = v2d->cur.xmax;
00780 
00781     /* nice text here would require changing the view matrix for texture text */
00782     if ((x2 - x1) / pixelx > 32) {
00783         draw_seq_text(v2d, seq, x1, x2, y1, y2, background_col);
00784     }
00785 }
00786 
00787 static Sequence *special_seq_update = NULL;
00788 
00789 static void UNUSED_FUNCTION(set_special_seq_update) (int val)
00790 {
00791 //  int x;
00792 
00793     /* if mouse over a sequence && LEFTMOUSE */
00794     if (val) {
00795 // XXX      special_seq_update= find_nearest_seq(&x);
00796     }
00797     else special_seq_update = NULL;
00798 }
00799 
00800 void draw_image_seq(const bContext *C, Scene *scene, ARegion *ar, SpaceSeq *sseq, int cfra, int frame_ofs)
00801 {
00802     struct Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00803     struct ImBuf *ibuf = NULL;
00804     struct ImBuf *scope = NULL;
00805     struct View2D *v2d = &ar->v2d;
00806     int rectx, recty;
00807     float viewrectx, viewrecty;
00808     float render_size = 0.0;
00809     float proxy_size = 100.0;
00810     float col[3];
00811     GLuint texid;
00812     GLuint last_texid;
00813     SeqRenderData context;
00814 
00815     render_size = sseq->render_size;
00816     if (render_size == 0) {
00817         render_size = scene->r.size;
00818     }
00819     else {
00820         proxy_size = render_size;
00821     }
00822     if (render_size < 0) {
00823         return;
00824     }
00825 
00826     viewrectx = (render_size * (float)scene->r.xsch) / 100.0f;
00827     viewrecty = (render_size * (float)scene->r.ysch) / 100.0f;
00828 
00829     rectx = viewrectx + 0.5f;
00830     recty = viewrecty + 0.5f;
00831 
00832     if (sseq->mainb == SEQ_DRAW_IMG_IMBUF) {
00833         viewrectx *= scene->r.xasp / scene->r.yasp;
00834         viewrectx /= proxy_size / 100.0f;
00835         viewrecty /= proxy_size / 100.0f;
00836     }
00837 
00838     if (frame_ofs == 0) {
00839         UI_GetThemeColor3fv(TH_SEQ_PREVIEW, col);
00840         glClearColor(col[0], col[1], col[2], 0.0);
00841         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
00842     }
00843 
00844     /* without this colors can flicker from previous opengl state */
00845     glColor4ub(255, 255, 255, 255);
00846 
00847     UI_view2d_totRect_set(v2d, viewrectx + 0.5f, viewrecty + 0.5f);
00848     UI_view2d_curRect_validate(v2d);
00849 
00850     /* only initialize the preview if a render is in progress */
00851     if (G.rendering)
00852         return;
00853 
00854     context = seq_new_render_data(bmain, scene, rectx, recty, proxy_size);
00855 
00856     if (special_seq_update)
00857         ibuf = give_ibuf_seq_direct(context, cfra + frame_ofs, special_seq_update);
00858     else if (!U.prefetchframes) // XXX || (G.f & G_PLAYANIM) == 0) {
00859         ibuf = give_ibuf_seq(context, cfra + frame_ofs, sseq->chanshown);
00860     else
00861         ibuf = give_ibuf_seq_threaded(context, cfra + frame_ofs, sseq->chanshown);
00862     
00863     if (ibuf == NULL)
00864         return;
00865 
00866     if (ibuf->rect == NULL && ibuf->rect_float == NULL)
00867         return;
00868     
00869     switch (sseq->mainb) {
00870         case SEQ_DRAW_IMG_IMBUF:
00871             if (sseq->zebra != 0) {
00872                 scope = make_zebra_view_from_ibuf(ibuf, sseq->zebra);
00873             }
00874             break;
00875         case SEQ_DRAW_IMG_WAVEFORM:
00876             if ((sseq->flag & SEQ_DRAW_COLOR_SEPARATED) != 0) {
00877                 scope = make_sep_waveform_view_from_ibuf(ibuf);
00878             }
00879             else {
00880                 scope = make_waveform_view_from_ibuf(ibuf);
00881             }
00882             break;
00883         case SEQ_DRAW_IMG_VECTORSCOPE:
00884             scope = make_vectorscope_view_from_ibuf(ibuf);
00885             break;
00886         case SEQ_DRAW_IMG_HISTOGRAM:
00887             scope = make_histogram_view_from_ibuf(ibuf);
00888             break;
00889     }
00890 
00891     if (scope) {
00892         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
00893         ibuf = scope;
00894     }
00895 
00896     if (ibuf->rect_float && ibuf->rect == NULL) {
00897         IMB_rect_from_float(ibuf);  
00898     }
00899     
00900     /* setting up the view - actual drawing starts here */
00901     UI_view2d_view_ortho(v2d);
00902 
00903     last_texid = glaGetOneInteger(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00904     glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00905     glGenTextures(1, (GLuint *)&texid);
00906 
00907     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, texid);
00908 
00909     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00910     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00911 
00912     glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA8, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, ibuf->rect);
00913     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00914 
00915     if (frame_ofs) {
00916         rctf tot_clip;
00917         tot_clip.xmin = v2d->tot.xmin + (ABS(v2d->tot.xmax - v2d->tot.xmin) * scene->ed->over_border.xmin);
00918         tot_clip.ymin = v2d->tot.ymin + (ABS(v2d->tot.ymax - v2d->tot.ymin) * scene->ed->over_border.ymin);
00919         tot_clip.xmax = v2d->tot.xmin + (ABS(v2d->tot.xmax - v2d->tot.xmin) * scene->ed->over_border.xmax);
00920         tot_clip.ymax = v2d->tot.ymin + (ABS(v2d->tot.ymax - v2d->tot.ymin) * scene->ed->over_border.ymax);
00921 
00922         glTexCoord2f(scene->ed->over_border.xmin, scene->ed->over_border.ymin); glVertex2f(tot_clip.xmin, tot_clip.ymin);
00923         glTexCoord2f(scene->ed->over_border.xmin, scene->ed->over_border.ymax); glVertex2f(tot_clip.xmin, tot_clip.ymax);
00924         glTexCoord2f(scene->ed->over_border.xmax, scene->ed->over_border.ymax); glVertex2f(tot_clip.xmax, tot_clip.ymax);
00925         glTexCoord2f(scene->ed->over_border.xmax, scene->ed->over_border.ymin); glVertex2f(tot_clip.xmax, tot_clip.ymin);
00926     }
00927     else {
00928         glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f); glVertex2f(v2d->tot.xmin, v2d->tot.ymin);
00929         glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f); glVertex2f(v2d->tot.xmin, v2d->tot.ymax);
00930         glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f); glVertex2f(v2d->tot.xmax, v2d->tot.ymax);
00931         glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 0.0f); glVertex2f(v2d->tot.xmax, v2d->tot.ymin);
00932     }
00933     glEnd( );
00934     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, last_texid);
00935     glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00936     glDeleteTextures(1, &texid);
00937 
00938     if (sseq->mainb == SEQ_DRAW_IMG_IMBUF) {
00939 
00940         float x1 = v2d->tot.xmin;
00941         float y1 = v2d->tot.ymin;
00942         float x2 = v2d->tot.xmax;
00943         float y2 = v2d->tot.ymax;
00944 
00945         /* border */
00946         setlinestyle(3);
00947 
00948         UI_ThemeColorBlendShade(TH_WIRE, TH_BACK, 1.0, 0);
00949 
00950         glBegin(GL_LINE_LOOP);
00951         glVertex2f(x1 - 0.5f, y1 - 0.5f);
00952         glVertex2f(x1 - 0.5f, y2 + 0.5f);
00953         glVertex2f(x2 + 0.5f, y2 + 0.5f);
00954         glVertex2f(x2 + 0.5f, y1 - 0.5f);
00955         glEnd();
00956 
00957         /* safety border */
00958         if ((sseq->flag & SEQ_DRAW_SAFE_MARGINS) != 0) {
00959             float fac = 0.1;
00960 
00961             float a = fac * (x2 - x1);
00962             x1 += a;
00963             x2 -= a;
00964 
00965             a = fac * (y2 - y1);
00966             y1 += a;
00967             y2 -= a;
00968 
00969             glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_LINE);
00970 
00971             uiSetRoundBox(UI_CNR_ALL);
00972             uiDrawBox(GL_LINE_LOOP, x1, y1, x2, y2, 12.0);
00973 
00974             glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_FILL);
00975 
00976         }
00977 
00978         setlinestyle(0);
00979     }
00980     
00981     /* draw grease-pencil (image aligned) */
00982 //  if (sseq->flag & SEQ_DRAW_GPENCIL)
00983 // XXX      draw_gpencil_2dimage(sa, ibuf);
00984 
00985     IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
00986     
00987     /* draw grease-pencil (screen aligned) */
00988 //  if (sseq->flag & SEQ_DRAW_GPENCIL)
00989 // XXX      draw_gpencil_view2d(sa, 0);
00990     
00991     /* ortho at pixel level */
00992     UI_view2d_view_restore(C);
00993 }
00994 
00995 #if 0
00996 void drawprefetchseqspace(Scene *scene, ARegion *UNUSED(ar), SpaceSeq *sseq)
00997 {
00998     int rectx, recty;
00999     int render_size = sseq->render_size;
01000     int proxy_size = 100.0; 
01001     if (render_size == 0) {
01002         render_size = scene->r.size;
01003     }
01004     else {
01005         proxy_size = render_size;
01006     }
01007     if (render_size < 0) {
01008         return;
01009     }
01010 
01011     rectx = (render_size * scene->r.xsch) / 100;
01012     recty = (render_size * scene->r.ysch) / 100;
01013 
01014     if (sseq->mainb != SEQ_DRAW_SEQUENCE) {

01016             rectx, recty, (scene->r.cfra), sseq->chanshown,

01021 
01022 /* draw backdrop of the sequencer strips view */
01023 static void draw_seq_backdrop(View2D *v2d)
01024 {
01025     int i;
01026     
01027     /* darker grey overlay over the view backdrop */
01028     UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BACK, -20);
01029     glRectf(v2d->cur.xmin,  -1.0,  v2d->cur.xmax,  1.0);
01030 
01031     /* Alternating horizontal stripes */
01032     i = MAX2(1, ((int)v2d->cur.ymin) - 1);
01033 
01034     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01035     while (i < v2d->cur.ymax) {
01036         if (((int)i) & 1)
01037             UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BACK, -15);
01038         else
01039             UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BACK, -25);
01040             
01041         glVertex2f(v2d->cur.xmax, i);
01042         glVertex2f(v2d->cur.xmin, i);
01043         glVertex2f(v2d->cur.xmin, i + 1);
01044         glVertex2f(v2d->cur.xmax, i + 1);
01045 
01046         i += 1.0;
01047     }
01048     glEnd();
01049     
01050     /* Darker lines separating the horizontal bands */
01051     i = MAX2(1, ((int)v2d->cur.ymin) - 1);
01052     UI_ThemeColor(TH_GRID);
01053     
01054     glBegin(GL_LINES);
01055     while (i < v2d->cur.ymax) {
01056         glVertex2f(v2d->cur.xmax, i);
01057         glVertex2f(v2d->cur.xmin, i);
01058             
01059         i += 1.0;
01060     }
01061     glEnd();
01062 }
01063 
01064 /* draw the contents of the sequencer strips view */
01065 static void draw_seq_strips(const bContext *C, Editing *ed, ARegion *ar)
01066 {
01067     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01068     View2D *v2d = &ar->v2d;
01069     Sequence *last_seq = seq_active_get(scene);
01070     int sel = 0, j;
01071     float pixelx = (v2d->cur.xmax - v2d->cur.xmin) / (v2d->mask.xmax - v2d->mask.xmin);
01072     
01073     /* loop through twice, first unselected, then selected */
01074     for (j = 0; j < 2; j++) {
01075         Sequence *seq;
01076         int outline_tint = (j) ? -60 : -150; /* highlighting around strip edges indicating selection */
01077         
01078         /* loop through strips, checking for those that are visible */
01079         for (seq = ed->seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
01080             /* boundbox and selection tests for NOT drawing the strip... */
01081             if ((seq->flag & SELECT) != sel) continue;
01082             else if (seq == last_seq) continue;
01083             else if (MIN2(seq->startdisp, seq->start) > v2d->cur.xmax) continue;
01084             else if (MAX2(seq->enddisp, seq->start + seq->len) < v2d->cur.xmin) continue;
01085             else if (seq->machine + 1.0f < v2d->cur.ymin) continue;
01086             else if (seq->machine > v2d->cur.ymax) continue;
01087             
01088             /* strip passed all tests unscathed... so draw it now */
01089             draw_seq_strip(scene, ar, seq, outline_tint, pixelx);
01090         }
01091         
01092         /* draw selected next time round */
01093         sel = SELECT;
01094     }
01095     
01096     /* draw the last selected last (i.e. 'active' in other parts of Blender), removes some overlapping error */
01097     if (last_seq)
01098         draw_seq_strip(scene, ar, last_seq, 120, pixelx);
01099 }
01100 
01101 static void seq_draw_sfra_efra(Scene *scene, View2D *v2d)
01102 {   
01103     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
01104     
01105     /* draw darkened area outside of active timeline 
01106      * frame range used is preview range or scene range */
01107     UI_ThemeColorShadeAlpha(TH_BACK, -25, -100);
01108 
01109     if (PSFRA < PEFRA) {
01110         glRectf(v2d->cur.xmin, v2d->cur.ymin, (float)PSFRA, v2d->cur.ymax);
01111         glRectf((float)PEFRA, v2d->cur.ymin, v2d->cur.xmax, v2d->cur.ymax);
01112     }
01113     else {
01114         glRectf(v2d->cur.xmin, v2d->cur.ymin, v2d->cur.xmax, v2d->cur.ymax);
01115     }
01116 
01117     UI_ThemeColorShade(TH_BACK, -60);
01118     /* thin lines where the actual frames are */
01119     fdrawline((float)PSFRA, v2d->cur.ymin, (float)PSFRA, v2d->cur.ymax);
01120     fdrawline((float)PEFRA, v2d->cur.ymin, (float)PEFRA, v2d->cur.ymax);
01121     
01122     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
01123 }
01124 
01125 /* Draw Timeline/Strip Editor Mode for Sequencer */
01126 void draw_timeline_seq(const bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
01127 {
01128     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01129     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, FALSE);
01130     SpaceSeq *sseq = CTX_wm_space_seq(C);
01131     View2D *v2d = &ar->v2d;
01132     View2DScrollers *scrollers;
01133     short unit = 0, flag = 0;
01134     float col[3];
01135     
01136     /* clear and setup matrix */
01137     UI_GetThemeColor3fv(TH_BACK, col);
01138     if (ed && ed->metastack.first) 
01139         glClearColor(col[0], col[1], col[2] - 0.1f, 0.0f);
01140     else 
01141         glClearColor(col[0], col[1], col[2], 0.0f);
01142     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
01143 
01144     UI_view2d_view_ortho(v2d);
01145     
01146     
01147     /* calculate extents of sequencer strips/data 
01148      * NOTE: needed for the scrollers later
01149      */
01150     boundbox_seq(scene, &v2d->tot);
01151     
01152     
01153     /* draw backdrop */
01154     draw_seq_backdrop(v2d);
01155     
01156     /* regular grid-pattern over the rest of the view (i.e. 25-frame grid lines) */
01157     // NOTE: the gridlines are currently spaced every 25 frames, which is only fine for 25 fps, but maybe not for 30...
01158     UI_view2d_constant_grid_draw(v2d);
01159     
01160     seq_draw_sfra_efra(scene, v2d);
01161 
01162     /* sequence strips (if there is data available to be drawn) */
01163     if (ed) {
01164         /* draw the data */
01165         draw_seq_strips(C, ed, ar);
01166         
01167         /* text draw cached (for sequence names), in pixelspace now */
01168         UI_view2d_text_cache_draw(ar);
01169     }
01170     
01171     /* current frame */
01172     UI_view2d_view_ortho(v2d);
01173     if ((sseq->flag & SEQ_DRAWFRAMES) == 0)      flag |= DRAWCFRA_UNIT_SECONDS;
01174     if ((sseq->flag & SEQ_NO_DRAW_CFRANUM) == 0) flag |= DRAWCFRA_SHOW_NUMBOX;
01175     ANIM_draw_cfra(C, v2d, flag);
01176     
01177     /* markers */
01178     UI_view2d_view_orthoSpecial(ar, v2d, 1);
01179     draw_markers_time(C, DRAW_MARKERS_LINES);
01180     
01181     /* preview range */
01182     UI_view2d_view_ortho(v2d);
01183     ANIM_draw_previewrange(C, v2d);
01184 
01185     /* overlap playhead */
01186     if (scene->ed && scene->ed->over_flag & SEQ_EDIT_OVERLAY_SHOW) {
01187         int cfra_over = (scene->ed->over_flag & SEQ_EDIT_OVERLAY_ABS) ? scene->ed->over_cfra : scene->r.cfra + scene->ed->over_ofs;
01188         glColor3f(0.2, 0.2, 0.2);
01189         // glRectf(cfra_over, v2d->cur.ymin, scene->ed->over_ofs + scene->r.cfra + 1, v2d->cur.ymax);
01190 
01191         glBegin(GL_LINES);
01192         glVertex2f(cfra_over, v2d->cur.ymin);
01193         glVertex2f(cfra_over, v2d->cur.ymax);
01194         glEnd();
01195 
01196     }
01197     
01198     /* reset view matrix */
01199     UI_view2d_view_restore(C);
01200 
01201     /* scrollers */
01202     unit = (sseq->flag & SEQ_DRAWFRAMES) ? V2D_UNIT_FRAMES : V2D_UNIT_SECONDSSEQ;
01203     scrollers = UI_view2d_scrollers_calc(C, v2d, unit, V2D_GRID_CLAMP, V2D_UNIT_VALUES, V2D_GRID_CLAMP);
01204     UI_view2d_scrollers_draw(C, v2d, scrollers);
01205     UI_view2d_scrollers_free(scrollers);
01206 }
